analysis.description: XTVNetworkUtils.verifyXTVSignatureAddress (/unique_chucks/32/0xa41aa09607ca80ee60d2ce166d4c02a71860e5c5.sol#74-109) is declared view but contains assembly code

XTVToken.burnTokens (/unique_chucks/32/0xa41aa09607ca80ee60d2ce166d4c02a71860e5c5.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > endTime (/unique_chucks/32/0xa41aa09607ca80ee60d2ce166d4c02a71860e5c5.sol)

XTVToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0xa41aa09607ca80ee60d2ce166d4c02a71860e5c5.sol#439)
XTVToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0xa41aa09607ca80ee60d2ce166d4c02a71860e5c5.sol#436-438)
XTVToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0xa41aa09607ca80ee60d2ce166d4c02a71860e5c5.sol#438-439)
